global_param.name: FROM
global_param.label: Sender
global_param.description: Name and adress of the sender, use Name:mail_address format.

global_param.name: TO
global_param.label: Recipient(s)
global_param.description: Comma separated list of permanent recipients, e.g Name1:address1,Name2:address2, etc. Leave empty if you want only the share feature.

global_param.name: SHARE
global_param.label: Enrich Shares
global_param.description: Add a notification pane to the share mechanism, proposing the user to enter her email to be notified when the shared repository is modified

global_param.name: ACTIONS
global_param.label: Share on...
global_param.description: Comma-separated list of action on wich the notification should be sent

global_param.name: SUBJECT
global_param.label: Subject
global_param.description: Subject to be displayed in the mail

global_param.name: BODY
global_param.label: Body
global_param.description: Body of the email. You can use AJXP_USER, AJXP_FILE, AJXP_FOLDER and AJXP_ACTION keywords.

global_param.name: MAILER
global_param.label: Mailer
global_param.description: Php mailer to use (see phpmail-lite documentation).'.
